resources.string: SPYSS is a non-profit organization spearheading a movement for social enrichment, healthy & peaceful world by passing precious yogic knowledge for free of cost since last 40 years.

SPYSS had its genesis in 1980 through the active initiation of Shri A.R. Ramaswamay Anna to assist all sections of people in the society irrespective of religion, caste, creed or gender.SPYSS was started with the mentorship of Late Shri Ajit kumar, Late Shri Raghavendra Swamiji of Maladihalli by following the teaching Yogacharya Padmavibhushan Shri B K S Iyengar Guruji’s teaching methodology.
An organization spearheading a movement for social enrichment through Yoga Sadhana.
In SPYSS today lakhs of people are practicing yoga in its 1000+ branches across India & overseas through its 25,000+ trained Yoga teachers for Free.
Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam (The Whole World is One Family)
Vision:To make the “Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam” (The World is one family) a living reality on earth.Mission: Strengthening the society by teaching Yoga for free
